original_text: “Go to Shiloh, and see what I did there. It was the first place that I chose where people would worship me. But I destroyed it because of the wicked things that my people, the Israelites, did.
korean_text: 너희는 내가 처음으로 내 이름을 둔 처소 실로에 가서 내 백성 이스라엘의 악에 대하여 내가 어떻게 행하였는지를 보라

sentences.original_text: and see what I did there
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 내가 그곳에서 무엇을 했는지 보라

sentences.original_text: that I chose where people would worship me
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 사람들이 나를 경배할 장소로 선택한 곳이었다

sentences.original_text: that my people, the Israelites, did
